long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is an essential tool for our application, which helps scientists to analyze available publications. The extension aims for making it easier for scientists to upload these publications to our web application, without having to paste the urls of these online publications into our website, that will annotate the publications based on the pre-set settings of the project.
